about_the_game:
Welcome to Planet Royale, the galaxy's premiere planet-hopping gameshow! Join Beeble the broadcast-bot, and other daring, determined and downright deranged competitors on planets scheduled for destruction by the Galactic Council, as you loot, shoot and blast your way to becoming the Galaxy's boldest warrior.



Heroes come in all shapes and sizes! Will you be backing Rusty, the second generation personal security-bot? Or perhaps Flora, the sentient forest sentinel, is more your speed. From the renegade starship pilot, Cosmo, to the Galactic Council's very own Maximillian 'Mutton-chops' McGee, there are endless encounters to be had against fresh foes in space! Get an edge on the competition by customizing your champion with unique skills, outfits and power-ups before landing on procedurally generated planets in this frantic, rootin' tootin' laser-shootin' Battle Royale.



Rumblings have been heard across all emergency frequencies that someone, or someTHING, is sweeping across the outer planets leaving devastation in its wake. Sightings of feral, toothsome maws and crackling energy beams suggest that, after nearly a century of galactic peace, the 'Green Tide' have returned from their exile, hungry for revenge on the Galactic Council that cast them out.
Who better to drive back the waves of ravenous foes then, than Planet Royale's very own cast of heroes!



  • Compete online with up to 20 players in a battle for survival and glory
  • Escape the planet-mining laser as it rips up the ground beneath your feet
  • Defeat hoards of invasive, alien monsters across a PvE campaign
  • With procedurally-generated worlds containing unique and creative weapon designs, no two games are ever alike.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board

short_description: Compete in the galaxy's most watched game show! Battle Royal on a planet that is being destroyed by a giant laser; each round players are eliminated as the world itself is destroyed and the escape pods become more scarce. Be the last person standing in a battle of wits, weapons and brute force.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
